Package org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.common

Provides common classes for a pluggable audit library such as common interfaces, factories, and default implementations.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Audit
    The audit chain combines one or more processors into an input / output sequence of processors.
    Event
    This class implements an interface to represent audit events, an event being comprised of a set of Fields.
    ExtendedEvent
    This interface defines several convenience methods (setters only!) to handle audit fields that are frequently used in audit events.
    Field
    This interface defines specification (getters, setters, maintenance methods) for fields to be used in audit events.
    Processor
    A processor can be part of an input / output sequence of processors.
    Reversible
    A class implementing the process() methods in the Processor interface may make modifications to an event, such as modifying existing fields, or adding new fields.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuditFactory
    A factory to create instances of objects that implement the Audit interface.
    CommonProperties
    This class specifies common properties.
    ProcessingObjects
    This class stores a set of processing objects, that is, objects that can be passed to a processor for use during event processing.
    ProcessorFactory
    A factory to create instances of objects that implement the Processor interface.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AuditErrorConditions
    This enum contains the standard field names used by the helper methods e.g.
    Encodings
    This enum contains encodings to be used, for instance, for the Field values.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AuditException
    This exception is thrown by Factories when they encounter an error that needs to be handled by the caller.
    FactoryException
    This exception is thrown by Factories when they encounter an error that needs to be handled by the caller.

Package org.beiter.michael.eaudit4j.common Description

Provides common classes for a pluggable audit library such as common interfaces, factories, and default implementations.
